ResourceHeader.ResourceName: THEMIS-A: On Board moments: ESA and SST Electron/Ion moments, density, flux, velocity, pressure and temperature.

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by LFB 20230727

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: THEMIS-A On Board moments. On board data outputs include number density, particle flux, energy flux, and a six component symetric momentum flux tensor. Other moments are calculated from these partial moments on the ground adding total pressure, velocity, plasma temperature (measured as a three dimensional energy vector), and a six component symetric pressure tensor to the list of data products. Number density and total pressure are scalar outputs. Velocity is calculated in DSL, GSE, GSM, and MFA coordinates (coordinate descriptions are listed below in Table 1). Magnetic Field Aligned pressure tensor and temperature are calculated as well. All quantities are calculated for both ions and electrons from a combination of ESA and SST data. Moments data are taken at spin resolution in all ESA survey modes except burst. The spacecraft potential, as measure by the EFI, is used to correct for spacecraft charging by shifting the particle energies for calculation; this eliminates contamination from photo-electrons. Also, weighting factors are used to account for instrument specific energy and angle efficiency variations. Table 1: Coordinate Descriptions. Despun Sun - L-vector (DSL): Z-axis points towards the spin axis, the Y-axis is obtained from the cross product of Z and the Spacecraft-Sun direction as viewed from the probe. The X-axis sits in the Z-axis-Sun plane and completes a right handed system. Geocentric Solar Ecliptic (GSE): Z-axis is normal to the solar ecliptic, the X-axis points from earth towards the Sun, and Y complets a right handed system. Geocentric solar Magnetosphereic (GSM): X-axis points from Earth to the Sun, the Y-axis is orthogonal to the Earth's magnetic dipole and points towards the dusk side, and the X-Z plane contains the dipole axis. Magnetic Field Aligned (MFA): Z-axis points along magnetic field lines, the Y-axis is the orthonormal cross product of the Z-axis and a vector pointing towards the Sun, and the X-axis completes the right handed system.

NumericalData.Caveats: Due to bit errors and data misdirection, ESA data (including moments) before April 27, 2007 should be considered dubious. Other data loss and formatting errors in the moments calculations and the ETC were not corrected until Aug. 6, 2007. Potential data from the EFI was not properly included in calculations between Nov. 18-22, 2007. EFI booms on THEMIS-A were not deployed until Jan 14, 2008, 17:00:00 UT. Moments data before this date is suspect to error from photoelectrons and spacecraft charging.

Parameter.Name: Ion Moment Data Quality
Parameter.Description: 0 = good data, 1 = missing S/C potential, 2 = electron density greater than 2*ion density, 3 = ion density greater than 2*electron density

Parameter.Name: Electron Moment Data Quality
Parameter.Description: 0 = good data, 1 = missing S/C potential, 2 = electron density greater than 2*ion density, 3 = ion density greater than 2*electron density

Parameter.Name: ESA On Board Moment (MOM) Ion Density, THEMIS-A
Parameter.Description: ESA Scalar ion number density calculated on board the spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Ion Total Pressure
Parameter.Description: Total ion pressure calculated on the ground from on board moments.

Parameter.Name: Ion Particle Flux Vector
Parameter.Description: ESA ion particle flux vector (in DSL coordinates) calculated on board the spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Ion Momentum Flux Tensor
Parameter.Description: ESA ion momentum flux tensor (in DSL coordinates) calculated on board the spacecraft (six-component, off-diagonal terms are symetric).

Parameter.Name: Ion Energy Flux Vector
Parameter.Description: ESA Ion energy flux vector (in DSL coordinates) calculated on board the spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Ion Velocity Vector in DSL
Parameter.Description: ESA Ion velocity vector (in DSL coordinates, see chart in data description) calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: Ion Velocity Vector in GSE
Parameter.Description: ESA Ion velocity vector (in GSE coordinates, see chart in data description) calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: Ion Velocity Vector in GSM
Parameter.Description: ESA Ion velocity vector (in GSM coordinates, see chart in data description) calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: Ion Pressure Tensor
Parameter.Description: ESA Ion pressure tensor (in DSL coordinates, see chart in data description) calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Vector DSL (Same time array as MOM Ion ESA data)
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field vector in DSL coordinates (same time array as MOM Ion ESA data); for calculated of field aligned moments.

Parameter.Name: Ion Velocity Vector, Field Aligned
Parameter.Description: ESA Ion velocity vector in magnetic field aligned coordinates; calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: Ion Temperature, Field Aligned (TprpFA1, TprpFA2, TparFA)
Parameter.Description: Ion Temperature, Field Aligned (TprpFA1, TprpFA2, TparFA)
Parameter.Caveats: ESA Three dimentional temperature in magnetic field aligned coordinates (see chart in data description).

Parameter.Name: Ion Pressure Tensor, Field Aligned
Parameter.Description: Ion Pressure Tensor, Field Aligned
Parameter.Caveats: ESA Symmetric pressure tensor about magnetic field aligned coordinates (see chart in data description); calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: tha_peim_time
Parameter.Description: tha_peim_time, UTC, in seconds since 01-Jan-1970 00:00:00; marks center time of data sample.

Parameter.Name: ESA On Board Moment (MOM) Electron Density, THEMIS-A
Parameter.Description: ESA electron density calculated on board the spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Electron Total Pressure
Parameter.Description: ESA Electron total pressure calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: Electron Particle Flux Vector
Parameter.Description: ESA Electron particle flux vector (in DSL coordinates) calculated on board the spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Electron Momentum Flux Tensor
Parameter.Description: ESA Electron momentum flux tensor (in DSL coordinates) calculated on board the spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Electron Energy Flux Vector
Parameter.Description: ESA Electron energy flux vector (in DSL coordinates) calculated on board the spacecraft.

Parameter.Name: Electron Velocity Vector in DSL
Parameter.Description: ESA Electron velocity vectors (in DSL coordinates) calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: Electron Velocity Vector in GSE
Parameter.Description: ESA Electron velocity vector (in GSE coordinates) calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: Electron Velocity Vector in GSM
Parameter.Description: ESA Electron velocity vector (in GSM coordinates) calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: Electron Pressure Tensor
Parameter.Description: ESA Electron pressure tensor (in DSL coordinates) calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Vector DSL (Same time array as MOM Electron ESA data)
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field Vector in DSL coordinates (same time array as MOM Electron ESA data); for calculation of field-aligned moments.

Parameter.Name: Electron Velocity Vector, Field Aligned
Parameter.Description: ESA Electron velocity vector in magnetic field aligned coordinates; calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.

Parameter.Name: Electron Temperature, Field Aligned (TprpFA1, TprpFA2, TparFA)
Parameter.Description: Three dimentional electron temperature in magnetic field aligned coordinates; calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments. (TprpFA1, TprpFA2, TparFA)
Parameter.Caveats: 3d temperatures around magnetic axis (Z) and normal axes (X,Y), where Y is Z direction crosed into Sun direction, and X completes orthogonal system.

Parameter.Name: Electron Pressure Tensor, Field Aligned
Parameter.Description: ESA Electron pressure tensor in magnetic field aligned coordinates; calculated on the ground from spacecraft moments.
Parameter.Caveats: Pressure tensor around magnetic axis (Z) and normal axes (X,Y), where Y is Z direction crosed into Sun direction, and X completes orthogonal system.

Parameter.Name: tha_peem_time
Parameter.Description: tha_peem_time, UTC, in seconds since 01-Jan-1970 00:00:00; marks center time of data sample.

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Potential, THEMIS-A
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft potential as measured by the EFI.

Parameter.Name: tha_pxxm_time
Parameter.Description: tha_pxxm_time, UTC, in seconds since 01-Jan-1970 00:00:00; marks center time of data sample.
